summary: Adds a standalone follower and trainer to Dragonsreach.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90599/90599-1523143696-1787320109.png[/img]

Move aside Farengar, Dragonsreach has a new sorceress! Tiffany, or, as she is sometimes known, Tiff, is a sorceress with a lot of talent who has set her sights on better serving the people of Whiterun. She can be found in Dragonsreach, waiting for her chance for adventure.

In addition to being a talented fire mage, Tiffany is also excellent at teaching others about the finer points of destruction magic. For a few septims, she can train the player's destruction magic skill up to level 90.

If enough people are interested, I can post a few more versions of her with different hairstyles.

This follower uses HD skin textures (between 2k-4k), so I am not sure how she will look or function on lower-end systems.

I HIGHLY recommend equipping her with the battlemage armour mod, which I linked below.

If you're a modder and you have any ideas about how I could improve or how I can lower my file sizes in the future, please let me know! I would love advice about how to improve.

Let me know what you think!
